text: @MattHancock There needs to be a serious review on inequalities that covid-19 has magnified! It’s hitting the most vulnerable of society the hardest and I’m not talking about just the direct impact of the illness. Care home staff and residents have been an after thought.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
